message: I feel a lot of gastric issues after having besan also

i have been diagnosed with stomach ulcers. I am on medication from past 15 days. I m not able to loose weight due to this reason. Doctar has advised me to loose weight, eat healthy and maintain a healthy lifestyle .
please check on gas producing food
besan khate hi gas banti hai
salad bhi zyada suit nahi karta hai
Doctir adviced not to eat much leafy veggies and salad
